name: 攻撃
description: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
戦闘後、敵と、その周囲２マスの敵の守備、魔防 -7 (敵の次回行動終了まで)

name: 速さ
description: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
戦闘後、敵と、その周囲２マスの敵の守備、魔防 -7 (敵の次回行動終了まで)

name: 守備
description: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
戦闘後、敵と、その周囲２マスの敵の守備、魔防 -7 (敵の次回行動終了まで)

name: 魔防
description: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
戦闘後、敵と、その周囲２マスの敵の守備、魔防 -7 (敵の次回行動終了まで)

name: バシリコス・専用
description: Grants Atk/Spd+5. Inflicts Def/Res-5

name: オートクレール・専用
description: Deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

name: ヒノカの紅薙刀・専用
description: Infantry and flying allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit.

name: ミストルティン・専用
description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. Unit takes 6 damage after combat.
攻撃、速さ、守備、魔防 +3　戦闘後、自分に 6 ダメージ

name: ウイングソード・専用
description: If unit's Spd - foe's Spd >= 1, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

name: 無銘の一門の剣・専用
description: Deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

description: Inflicts Def-6 on foes (excluding dragons) within 2 spaces at the start of each turn, through their next actions. If unit is attacked by foe using bow, daggers, magic, or staff, unit receives Def/Res+6 during combat.

name: 深き印の風・専用
description: ターン開始時、敵軍内で最も攻撃が高い敵の攻撃-7(敵の次回行動終了まで) 戦闘中、攻撃、速さ、守備、魔防が隣接している味方の人数×2だけ上昇

description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6 during combat.

name: ブリュンヒルデ・専用
description: If in combat against magic foe, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 30%. If foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and unit's Def >= foe's Def+1, foe cannot make a follow-up attack.
敵が魔法の時、戦闘中、最初に受けた攻撃のダメージを30％軽減 敵が弓、暗器、魔法、杖で、敵より守備が1以上高い時、敵は追撃不可

name: 守備
description: After combat, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-6 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

description: After combat, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-6 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

name: 速さ
description: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-6 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions. Also grants Def/Res+6 to unit and allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn.
戦闘後、敵の周囲２マスの敵の攻撃、速さ、守備、魔防 -6 (敵の次回行動終了まで) 戦闘後、自分と、その周囲２マスの敵の守備、魔防 +6 (1 ターン)

name: 重装無効化
description: If in combat against an armored foe, nullifies foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.
敵が重装の時、戦闘中、敵の強化の + を無効にする (無効になるのは鼓舞や応援等の + 効果)
prereq: アーマーキラー鍛+,貫きの槍鍛+,ハンマー鍛+

name: 騎馬無効化
description: If in combat against a cavalry foe, nullifies foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

description: Damage from unit's staff will be calculated the same as other weapons.
杖は他の武器同様のダメージ計算になる

description: The enemy cannot counterattack.
敵は反撃不可

name: 攻撃
description: If foe's Range = 2, damage calculated using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

name: ソール・カティ・専用
description: If unit initiates combat with HP <= 75%, follow-up attacks occur immediately after unit's attack. Unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack when HP <= 75% and attacking a foe that can counter.
自分のＨＰが 75% 以下で、自分から攻撃した時、追撃可能なら自分の攻撃直後に追撃を行う 自分のＨＰが 75% 以下で、自分から攻撃した時、敵が反撃可能なら絶対追撃

name: 攻撃
description: If unit initiates combat with HP <= 75%, follow-up attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

name: ジークムント・専用
description: Grants adjacent allies Atk+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn. Unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack when HP >= 90% and attacking a foe that can counter.
ターン開始時、周囲１マスの味方の攻撃 +4 (1ターン) 自分のＨＰが 90% 以上で、自分から攻撃した時、絶対追撃

name: ジークリンデ・専用
description: At start of turn, grants adjacent allies Atk+4 for 1 turn. During combat, grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res = highest bonus on allies within 2 spaces. Each stat bonus calculated independently.
ターン開始時、周囲1マスの味方の攻撃+4(1ターン) 戦闘中、攻撃、速さ、守備、魔防が周囲2マスの味方の攻撃、速さ、守備、魔防の強化の最大値だけ上昇(最大値は各能力値ごとに計算)

name: ファルシオン覚醒・専用
description: Restores 10 HP at the start of every second turn. Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat if unit is adjacent to an ally.
exclusive: クロム,マルス(仮面),ルキナ

name: ファルシオン・専用
description: Restores 10 HP at the start of every second turn. Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

name: ファルシオン外伝・専用
description: If unit's HP = 100% at start of combat and unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice then takes 5 damage after combat.

description: Restores 10 HP at the start of every second turn.

description: Restores 10 HP at the start of every second turn.

description: Restores 10 HP at the start of every second turn.

name: 死神の暗器・専用
